subject: Class Cast Exception
msgSnippet: Hi all, I am having a problem testing my code that is referencing another SourceForge project code (Dom4J). My test looks like: public void testDocumentBuild()
messageBody:
Hi all,

I am having a problem testing my code that is referencing
another SourceForge project code (Dom4J).

My test looks like:

public void testDocumentBuild() {
String xml = "<firstnode><secondnode val1='hi'
val2='there'>something or other</secondnode></firstnode>";

try {
XmlDocument domTree = new XmlDocument(xml);
} catch (DocumentException de) {
Assert.fail("No exception should have been thrown. The
Xml Tree was built properly.");
} catch (Exception e) {
Assert.fail("New XmlDocument should have trapped any
exceptions");
}
}

Whenever I try to run this test, I get the following error message:
java.lang.UnsupportedClassVersionError: mbf/util/XmlDocument
(Unsupported major.minor version 48.0)

I have no problem running any of my other tests that directly
reference my own source code.

Any help is greatly appreciated!

Doug Hoppes
